definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: They checked out all the goods in the store.
sentences.chinese: 他們把商店中所有貨品都進行了盤點。

sentences.english: We guarantee that you will be able to get any Japan goods without stepping out your doorstep.
sentences.chinese: 我們保證可以令您足不出戶便可以買遍全日本貨品。

sentences.english: She riffed through the items on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速地瀏覽了一遍櫃檯上的貨品。

sentences.english: All product price and information is subject to in store display.
sentences.chinese: 所有貨品價格及資料以店內陳列爲準。

sentences.english: We are very interested in an exclusive arrangement with your factoryfor the promotion of your products in Bahrain.
sentences.chinese: 盼望能成爲貴公司獨家代理，促銷在巴林市場的貨品。

sentences.english: Users can also get a report on all items that they have ordered in the past.
sentences.chinese: 用戶還能夠得到他們過去已訂購的所有貨品的報告。

sentences.english: Checks invoices against goods ordered and received.
sentences.chinese: 覈對貨品定單及收貨與發票是否一致。

sentences.english: I saw a boy thieving in the showroom .
sentences.chinese: 我看見一個男孩在貨品陳列室行竊。

sentences.english: Mr. Chan makes and sells matallic balls.
sentences.chinese: 陳生負責製造及售賣某某貨品。

sentences.english: This offer is not applicable to special and net priced items.
sentences.chinese: 上述優惠不適用於特價品或折實價貨品。

sentences.english: Would you be able to get it there on time by a ground delivery?
sentences.chinese: 你們有沒有辦法用海陸運輸，將貨品準時送達？

sentences.english: This is a demo website only, products shown are for demonstrational purposes.
sentences.chinese: 本網頁爲示範網頁，所有貨品僅爲展示用途。

sentences.english: More and more cheap-priced groceries set up special shelves to sell out-of-date food.
sentences.chinese: 目前，日本越來越多的廉價食品店設專櫃賣過期貨品。

sentences.english: A shoplifter was caught by the store clerks.
sentences.chinese: 一位佯裝顧客而偷竊貨品的人被店員逮到。

sentences.english: Some of our items are only for pre-pay order.
sentences.chinese: 部份貨品爲限量預定款式。

sentences.english: In case of need we can offer you some other brand of the same specification.
sentences.chinese: 萬一有需要，我們可供應同樣規格的其它牌號貨品。

definition: to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
